subject: Football
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Four quarterbacks are challenging Dan Marino’s single-season passing record of 5,084 yards, which says as much about his 1984 season as it does about the current N.F.L.
snippet: Four quarterbacks are challenging Dan Marino’s single-season passing record of 5,084 yards, which says as much about his 1984 season as it does about the current N.F.L.
